collation.p: 14 quires and a single leaf: i-xiii10 (folios 1-129), xiv8 (folios 130-137) plus folio 138. Quires marked with catchwords at the end.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental semi-cursive script, unpunctuated, of the 12th century.
